misc: His usual shot shape could be described as a "power draw".
biography: Jussi, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a blend of competitive spirit and affable charm to the course. Representing St. Laurence Golf, Jussi is known for his powerful drives, often shaped into a significant draw.

A formidable competitor, Jussi has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on four occasions. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Jussi's presence is always felt, contributing to the dynamic atmosphere of the tournament.

Though he is not expected to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, golf enthusiasts know that anything can happen. His fans and fellow competitors alike eagerly anticipate his future appearances, where his skill and sportsmanship are sure to shine.
